attributes.action: drop the rate of duty on fuel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: alister darling is asking fuel companies to pass on the savings on the price of fuel . so why does he not lead by lowering the duty the government collect on fuel ?????? i was always told that you should lead by example well come on chancelor show the wayu and drop the duty on fuel and maybe the oil companies will follow on its only fair . you have ripped the brittish road users off for long enough . how many more haulage companies do you want in recievership due to this government while you show favouritism towards the foreign trucks whos driving leaves a lot to be disired . get behind british businesses who spend in the uk

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
